text: The 1960 Italian Athletics Championships was the 50th edition of the Italian Athletics Championships and were held in Bologna on 25-27 September (track & field events). ==Champions== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" width=80% style="font-size:100%; text-align:left;" |- !Event !!Athlete !!Performance |- |100 metres|| Livio Berruti ||align=center|10.5 |- |200 metres|| Livio Berruti ||align=center|20.8 |- |400 metres|| Mario Fraschini ||align=center|47.5 |- |800 metres|| Mario Fraschini ||align=center|1:52.5 |- |1500 metres|| Alfredo Rizzo ||align=center|3:48.5 |- |5000 metres|| Luigi Conti ||align=center|14.19.0 |- |10,000 metres|| Luigi Conti ||align=center|29:43.2 |- |110 metres hurdles|| Giovanni Cornacchia ||align=center|14.3 |- |400 metres hurdles|| Salvatore Morale ||align=center|52.2 |- |3000 metres steeplechase|| Enzo Volpi ||align=center|9:16.3 |- |High jump|| Brunello Martini ||align=center|1.98 |- |Pole vault|| Angelo Baronchelli ||align=center|4.15 |- |Long jump|| Attilio Bravi ||align=center|7.27 |- |Triple jump|| Pierluigi Gatti ||align=center|15.61 |- |Shot put|| Silvano Meconi ||align=center|17.46 |- |Discus throw|| Adolfo Consolini ||align=center|53.75 |- |Hammer throw|| Ennio Boschini ||align=center|56.07 |- |Javelin throw|| Carlo Lievore ||align=center|76.21* |- |Decathlon|| Franco Sar ||align=center|6816 |- |Half Marathon|| Silvio De Florentis ||align=center|1:28:58** |- |Marathon|| Rino Lavelli ||align=center|02:25:19 |- |10,000 metres track walk|| Abdon Pamich ||align=center|45:19.4 |- |20 km road walk|| Abdon Pamich ||align=center|01:38:42 |- |50 km road walk|| Abdon Pamich ||align=center|04:23:02 |- |Cross country (long course)|| Franco Volpi ||align=center| |} ===Women=== {| class="wikitable" width=80% style="font- size:100%;
